traits.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The skeleton doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The skeleton makes two greataxe attacks.

actions.name: Greataxe
entries: Melee atk +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 25 (3d12 + 6 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Freezing Stare
entries: The skeleton targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or take 35 (10d6 damage) cold damage and be {@condition paralyzed} until the end of its next turn.
